fn.p: Change History: March 2020. C Skevaki, NG Papadopoulos, PP Nelson updated the abstract, text, and Figs. 2, 4, and 5 and added Fig. 3.
This is an update of NG Papadopoulos and CL Skevaki. Viruses of the Lung. Encyclopedia of Respiratory Medicine, 2006, Pages 483–488. https://doi.org/10.1016/B0-12-370879-6/00494-4.
